MetroAE deployment template CSV: This Spreadsheet can be used as an Input to MetroAE

column2: Common configuration settings for this deployment

column5: Descriptions

Full path to the directory where the Nuage unzipped files for this deployment can be found  E.g. qcow2 files. When using docker container the path needs to be a relative path from the images path specified during setup.
Domain name for this deployment. E.g. company.net.
For clustered VSD, the XMPP FQDN for the cluster; For standalone VSD, the FQDN of the single VSD
List of one or more NTP server addresses that must be in dotted-decimal (IPv4) or hexidecimal (IPv6) format
List of one or more DNS server addresses for resolving component domain names. Must be in dotted-decimal (IPv4) or hexidecimal (IPv6) format.

Network Bridge used for the management interface of a component or the BOF interface on VSC. This will be a Distributed Virtual PortGroup (DVPG) when deploying on vCenter or a Linux network bridge when deploying on KVM. This field can be overridden by defining the management network bridge separately in the component configuration

Network Bridge used for the data path of a component or the Control interface on VSC. This will be a Distributed Virtual PortGroup (DVPG) when deploying on vCenter or a Linux network bridge when deploying on KVM. This field can be overridden by defining the Data network bridge separately in the component configuration
Descriptions
The name of the deployment.  This will be used as the the deployment directory name.  No special characters allowed.

column3: Install all SD-WAN components (VSD, VSC, VSTAT, NSG and VNSUtil) on KVM
column5: A suitable description of the deployment

column2: Configure NFS Server VM using MetroAE. Note: Metroae will not bring up the NFS server, it will configure it for Elasticsearch mounting.

column5: Descriptions
Hostname of NFS Server
IP address of the NFS server.

column6: Name of the access port for the NSGv
VLAN range of the access port for the NSGv
Network bridge used for the access network when installing an NSGv. This will be a Distributed Virtual PortGroup (DVPG) when deploying on vCenter or a Linux network bridge

column2: Specify configuration for Nuage MetroAE NSGvs.

column5: Descriptions
Name of the NSGv VM on the hypervisor/vcenter
Type of environment into which the NSGv will be instantiated
Hostname or IP address of the hypervisor or vCenter server where the NSGv will be instantiated

column2: Nuage Utility Host External Interfaces List
Configuration for external interfaces for NUH

column6: Name of the external network for NUH
IP address of the external network interface. This network is the one where NSGs reside
IP address of the gateway on the external network
Optional External FQDN name. A valid cert of this FQDN will be generated from the VSD and transferred to NUH

column2: Configuration for Nuage Utility Host VM.

column5: Descriptions
Hostname of the Nuage Utility Host instance
IP address of the management interface
IP Prefix length for the management network
IP address of the gateway on the management network
Hostname or IP address of the KVM hypervisor where the NUH VM will be instantiated

column2: Configuration for Nuage VNS Proxy VM.

column5: Descriptions
Hostname of the Proxy/Util-VM instance
Type of hypervisor environment into which the instance will be created. Use 'none' when skipping predeploy.

Hostname or IP address of the hypervisor where VM  will be instantiated. In the case of deployment in a vCenter environment, this will be the FQDN of the vCenter Server. When target_server_type is set to openstack, this property is unused and should be set to 0.0.0.0
IP address of the management interface
IP Prefix length for the management network
IP address of the gateway on the management network

column6: Type of hypervisor environment where VMs will be instantiated. Use 'none' when skipping predeploy.

Hostname or IP address of the hypervisor where VM  will be instantiated. In the case of deployment in a vCenter environment, this will be the FQDN of the vCenter Server. When target_server_type is set to openstack, this property is unused and should be set to 0.0.0.0
The BOF/Management IP address of the controller
Gateway IP on the Management network

column5: vsds3
vsd3.company.com
kvm
column7: Type of hypervisor environment where VMs will be instantiated. Use 'none' when skipping predeploy.

Hostname or IP address of the hypervisor where VM  will be instantiated. In the case of deployment in a vCenter environment, this will be the FQDN of the vCenter Server. When target_server_type is set to openstack, this property is unused and should be set to 0.0.0.0
Management network prefix length for VSD

column2: Specify configuration for Nuage VSD stats (VSTAT).

column5: vstats3
vstat2.company.com
column7: Management network host name for the VSTAT

column5: kvm
column7: Type of hypervisor environment where VMs will be instantiated. Use 'none' when skipping predeploy.

Hostname or IP address of the hypervisor where VM  will be instantiated. In the case of deployment in a vCenter environment, this will be the FQDN of the vCenter Server. When target_server_type is set to openstack, this property is unused and should be set to 0.0.0.0
Management network IP address for the VSTAT
Management network prefix length for the VSTAT
